founder.title: A few words about the Founder
founder.p1: I am a software developer coming from a general background. Since childhood, I had a strong passion for computers and programming. That curiosity led me to start my journey. In 2025, I founded a digital agency named Bikroyon. Since then, I have been helping brands increase their sales through websites and social media. I have worked on more than 350 projects including e-commerce websites, landing pages, and custom web applications. My goal is to build websites that are effective and result-driven for every client.
founder.p2: My core work philosophy is to understand the client's needs and provide the best solution. I believe a great website is not just a combination of design and features—it is a powerful tool for business growth and success. That's why I work with full dedication in every project to deliver the highest quality service.
founder.name: Abdul Baset Bappy

support.subtitle: Private Support Channel
support.description1: We have a private Telegram support channel for our service users where I personally answer your questions. We promise — all questions will be answered within 24 hours. In most cases, you’ll get a reply within 1 hour.
support.description2: Additionally, you can join the channel to get live work updates, guidelines, and special tips.

landing_section.title_first: Make your Brand's first Impression with a
landing_section.title_last: — start with a perfect Single Page Website.
landing_section.description: With 300+ landing page design experience, I know how to make a business credible and converting. If you haven’t created your landing page yet, you’re one step behind your competitors. We create pages that really work, tailored to your brand, goals, and audience.

landing_defination.what_is_description: A landing page is a special web page focused on a product, service, or offer. Its purpose is to encourage the visitor to take a specific action, such as filling out a form, signing up, or making a purchase.
landing_defination.why_needed_description: Understanding how Facebook's algorithm works will help you realize why a landing page is essential. Some users prefer to send messages directly via Facebook inbox, so Facebook separates them. Additionally, users who order directly from landing pages or websites create a separate audience. Using a landing page allows you to target your audience more effectively and increase conversions.
landing_defination.benefits_heading: Benefits of having a landing page:
benefits_list: Run ads with server-side tracking and pixel setup to make more sales
Retarget visitors who left footprints on your website to increase conversions
One-click automatic order entry for Studfast, Pathao courier
